answers.answer: Google "gestational diabetes" for information.  You will learn if you have it at a certain point in your pregnancy because they will test you for it.
You don't really have symptoms. They test for it between 25-28 weeks. Im 24 weeks and i have an appt next week to be tested for it.

I have it and found out at 28 weeks. No symptoms. It's all your body n can't help it. You'll simply have to monitor it from now til labor to make sure your sugar levels don't get too high and negatively effect the baby.

question: Has anyone had justational diabeties? Tell me how you found out and what symptoms did u have?
title: justational diabetes
